TestInformation.Title: Timed Gem5 Compilation
TestInformation.Description: This test times how long it takes to compile Gem5. Gem5 is a simulator for computer system architecture research. Gem5 is widely used for computer architecture research within the industry, academia, and more.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Time To Compile

TestProfile.ExternalDependencies: build-utilities, scons, python, zlib-development, protobuf, boost-development
